prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: "Quests" by Margaret Thomson Janvier, Accession #7746-d, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett in 1963, accessioned on March 30, 1970, and changed to a gift on July 1, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Poem; signed "Margaret Vandegrift," one line of poem is marked through and the replacement line is enclosed.
Poem; signed "Margaret Vandegrift," one line of poem is marked through and the replacement line is enclosed.
